snippet: The Japanese equestrian Hiroshi Hoketsu qualified for the London Olympics at age 70, although it is not yet clear if he will compete.
abstract: Japanese equestrian Hiroshi Hoketsu qualifies for the 2012 Olympics at age 70, although it is not yet clear if he will compete; other Olympics news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Japanese equestrian Hiroshi Hoketsu qualified for the London Olympics at age 70, although it is not yet clear if he will compete.
